name: Arboreal Grappler
description: The Arboreal Grappler is a Medium aberration with powerful tentacles and a swift, stealthy demeanor suited for forested or jungle environments.
memorable: Its mobility and grappling abilities make it an efficient ambusher that can overpower foes before they even realize they are in danger.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting adventurers and restrain them to gain an advantage in combat.
relations: Often associated with other cunning predators in forested areas, it may encounter or work alongside similar stealthy creatures.
strengths: Excels in grappling and maneuverability, employing tactics that leverage its ability to ambush and control opponents.
weaknesses: Relatively low Intelligence and Charisma, making it less effective in social situations.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack consisting of a Bite and two Tentacle attacks, dealing piercing and bludgeoning damage while attempting to restrain opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Mobile Grappler ability allows it to maintain full speed when dragging a creature it has grappled.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, making it exceptionally good at avoiding detection and navigating tricky terrain.
additional_information: Uses Boscage Brachiation to climb without provoking opportunity attacks.
Can climb ceilings effortlessly due to its Spider Climb ability.
Has a notable escape DC of 13 for grappling escapes.
Maintains a good defense with natural armor providing an AC of 14.
